## Different ways to participate

There are different ways to participate to the project:

1. Imagine [schemes](./schemes.qmd) that can model emotions
2. Adapt existing data to one of the proposed schemes
3. Write conceptual and/or technical [blog posts](./blog.qmd)

For any further detail, see the contacts in the [home page](index.qmd)
